This is a copy of the current program

```basic
LET CH = 109
LET HP = 1
PRINT "HOST USB:   #US"
PRINT "HIGH POWER: #HP"
PRINT "CHANNEL:    #CH"
PRINT "CALLSIGN:   #CS"
10 GPS 360
PRINT "LLH: #LT #LN #AT"
TELE
GOTO 10
```
